casebody.data:
Benedict FEJOKU, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
PRUDENTIAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY OF AMERICA, INC., n/k/a Prudential Financial, Inc., Leeds, Morelli & Brown, LLP, Lenard Leeds, Steven A. Morelli, Jeffrey K. Brown, and Mark Faber, Defendants-Respondents. Linda Guyden, Plaintiff,
v.
Leeds, Morelli & Brown LLP, Lenard Leeds, Esq., Steven A. Morelli, Esq., and Jeffrey K. Brown, Esq., Defendants. C-345 September Term 2018
081467 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 16, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-1026/1027-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
